profile:
Are you looking to remove a load bearing wall to make an open concept space? LARCON Structural can make your dreams a reality! 
 
Our team, including our Engineers will work alongside you from the start of your project until the end. We will create the Design, Engineer Drawings, Get a Building Permit, and Renovate. 
 
Our Services include the following: 
 
* Design and Consultations 
* Engineer Structural Drawings (P.Eng) 
* Building Permits 
* Load Bearing Wall Removal 
    - LVL Beam (wood) 
    - Flitch Beam (wood & steel) 
    - iBeam / Wide Flange Beam (steel) 
* Footings 
* Floor Raising 

 
We have crews serving the GTA, from Burlington to Pickering, Toronto to Barrie and all in-between! 
 
We are fully licensed and carry $2,000,000 in liability insurance & WSIB. 
 
Contact us for a FREE Consultation!
name: Larcon Structural

profile:
26 years experience in Structural Residential Framing. Load Bearing Wall Removals, New construction, Additions, Open Concept Living Spaces, Fire, Flood, Wind Damage, Insurance work and Basement Framing.
We appreciate that homeowners want the very best products and services available. We aim to do our very best with every job. 
From Demolition to finished product, No Job Is Too Small...we love it all!
service_area: Toronto, Hamilton, Vaughan, Halton Hills, Peel Region, Mississauga, Durham County, Greater Toronto Area
products:
With the cost of energy consistently going up and never down, homeowners and businesses are becoming more aware of greener and more sustainable energies. Adapting these energies to their homes and businesses at times requires modifications to the structure. "Rebuild the Planet" can do this for you. 
From a simple inspection to structural engineering and Structural Framing, no modification is too daunting. Clean and precise, following specifications of site plan approved drawings, all work is completed to your satisfaction.
services:
No job is too small. We take pride in all sorts of building projects and work closely with engineers and inspectors. Customer satisfaction is of primary importance, "YOU'RE ONLY AS GOOD AS YOUR LAST JOB" 
Our aim is to meet with you and discuss the scope of your project/renovation within 24 hours of initial contact.
We provide our services year round, happy to be of service.
specialities:
-Creating open concept spaces and layouts by removing load bearing walls and installing laminate and/or steel beams. 
-Removal of structure bearing post(s) in basements
-New home construction with the latest framing techniques
-Structural reinforcement to older homes
-Additions on front, top or rear of existing homes
-Basement framing and structural modifications to accommodate  greater square footage for more living space
-New builds from ground/foundation up.
name: Rebuild The Planet

profile:
This year (2022) we celebrate being 20 Years in houses building business! We are grow up from small business to big corporation doing 50-100 projects per year !

We do ALL kinds of STRUCTURAL framing !!! 

R&M General Contracting is proud to have been a part of "LOVE IT OR LIST IT" TV Show!

Over these years we have taken several O.B.O.A (Ontario Building Official Association Courses), several Municipal Affairs and Housing Exams to become Building Inspectors, as well as a Certificate of Qualification for Terazzo, Tile and Marble Setter #400139292.

Whatever your custom home needs - we can do it for you. There is no project too big or too small. Feel free to give us a call for a free estimate.

R&M General Contracting is skilled at the following: rough carpentry, full bathroom renovation, full basement renovation, LVL installation, roof framing, any carpentry projects, tiles/marble/granite/stone inside/outside installation, drywall installation, taping and painting, hardwood, laminate, pot lights, waterproofing inside/outside, any concrete projects.  In short, pretty much anything that you need!
service_area: Toronto, Etobicoke, Scarborough, North York, Richmond Hill, Markham, Mississauga, Brampton, Oakville and other areas close to GTA.
services: Rough carpentry, full bathroom renovation, full basement renovation, LVL installation, roof framing, any carpentry projects, tiles/marble/granite/stone inside/outside installation, small electrical and plumbing jobs (subcontracted to licensed trades-persons), drywall installation, taping and painting, hardwood, laminate, pot lights, waterproofing inside/outside, any concrete projects.  In short, pretty much anything that the client requires done.
specialities:
We hold GOVERNMENT issued certificate for tiles/marble/granite/stone/terrazzo. Certificate # 400139292.  Several O.B.O.A (Ontario Building Official Association Courses)
Several Municipal Affairs and Housing Exams to become Building Inspectors

profile:
Willowtree Construction Company's founder Frank Samifanni started undertaking renovation projects as a sole proprietor in 1997. Frank's philosophy in delivering quality work and that has earned him positive and solid reviews and a strong referral base. In 2007 Frank incorporated his company under Willowtree Construction Company and went full force as a General Contractor. 

Presently Willowtree Construction Company undertakes mid size to large size projects from design/ build custom built homes, additions and extensions to the existing structure, complete home renovation including kitchen, bathroom and basement renovations to structural changes . 
As a general Contracting company our trained and licensed trades carry on the work assigned with full professionalism and promptness. We love to deliver turn key projects.
services:
Builder, General Conractor, Project Management
Design Build Residential custom homes
Design Build additions
Design Renovate complete interior home
Structural changes
specialities:
Design Build Residential custom homes
Design Build additions
Design Renovate complete interior home
Structural changes

profile:
Welcome to Open Concept 

The company specializes in structural engineering and renovations. OCEC LTD was founded to be able to help others live their lives without unwanted obstructions. It may be a wall, a duct hump or post in the basement that is in the way of your pool table or a home gym or simply in the middle of a room. Whatever the case may be it’s not IM'possible. Our innovative approach to basement post removal has been designed and approved by qualified engineers with many satisfied customers. The method does not require any welding or major beam replacements. We have also made it possible through our ingenuity to be able to sink beams into the joists to have a perfectly flat ceiling finish on both the first and/or second floors of your home.

We are an insured business from both and engineering and construction stand point. 

Liability Insurance on Construction and Engineering Services. 

We're social here:
https://www.instagram.com/ocecltd/
https://www.facebook.com/ocecltd
https://twitter.com/OpenConceptEng1
services:
Basement Post Removals
Wall Removals
Load Bearing Wall Removal 
Engineering Services 
Floor & Ceiling Leveling 
Air Duct Relocation
specialities:
Basement Steel Post Removal with structural reinforcement to existing beam. No welding and no mess with new larger beams. 

Wall removals

Air duct "hump" under beam removal
warranty_terms: Yes! We offer a 2 year warranty or the time the named individual in the quote and invoice owns the property, which ever one is longer! We guarantee all of our work including materials and workmanship.

profile:
Dynamic Wall Removal is a division of Dynamic Design and Construction which specializes
in Load-bearing wall removal and structural work/repair. In recent years the
open concept design has become the new trend in home renovations, therefore we
have compiled the best and most experienced team together to meet our
customer’s needs.
By combining outstanding service, extraordinary craftsmanship and competitive pricing, we
have built a reputation of being customer centric.
We are fully licensed and insured with over 15 years of experience.
Contact us today for a free estimate and you will be ONE step closer to realizing your dream of open house. 
As we always say “IT’S OUR JOB BUT WE NEVER FORGET IT’S YOUR HOME”

● Structural Engineer Drawings
● Building Permits
● Load Bearing Wall Removal (Steel Beams, LVL Beams, Flitch Beams)
● Cathedral Ceilings
● Major structural repairs
● Floor leveling
● Footing

profile:
Welcome to GTA Framing and Drywall.  Every building requires a precise and solid foundation. Framing is the most important part of all construction work as it determines everything that comes after. Framing consists of vertical steel columns and horizontal I-beams constructed in a rectangular grid to support the floors, roof and walls of a building. 

Our Services: Framing, Drywall, Taping and Plastering, Insulation and Fire Rating. 

Contact us today to schedule an appointment.
services:
Framing
Every building requires a precise and solid foundation. Framing is the most important part of all construction work as it determines everything that comes after. Framing consists of vertical steel columns and horizontal I-beams constructed in a rectangular grid to support the floors, roof and walls of a building.
SERVICE DETAILS

Drywall
We are adept in the use of a wide variety of drywall accommodating our clients’ different needs. Using the right type of drywall is crucial in every project as it affects the subsequent construction. Drywall can offer sound reduction, fireproofing, and waterproofing for high moisture areas such as washrooms. Our experienced staff will help you understand and decide what options will work best for your projects.

SERVICE DETAILS

Taping & Plastering
Ensure your walls and ceilings do not crack with this integral service. We have mastered the art of taping, meshing and plastering to create uniform walls without lines and streaks.

SERVICE DETAILS

Insulation
We insulate your building to specific building requirements. Whether you need hot thermal solutions or sound insulation, we can meet your every need.

SERVICE DETAILS

Fire Rating
Most projects require compliance with fire code and safety standards. Our experienced staff will ensure your project meets all safety requirements.
warranty_terms: Yes. 1 Year on Workmanship. Depends on project completed.

profile:
WOODLINE Corporation has been established and registered since 2015 as a Custom Framing Company. The WOODLINE Team provides services in framing custom homes, basements, decks, home additions, pergolas and sheds as well as custom architectural metal work.

All projects are delivered with quality, care and within budget. WOODLINE strives to complete all projects whether big or small on time, and under the careful planning of our experienced Project Manager with 15 years experience in the construction industry.

Our employees are highly skilled with over 12 years experience in the House Framing Industry. We continue to upgrade and stay competitive within industry standards.

profile:
Residential/Commercial renovation and handyman services for any project.

Our Services are available:
- Anywhere in the GTA
- Anytime of the day or week
- Fully Insured (up to for $5,000,000) and Licensed 
- Always Punctual, Detailed and Professional

Our Past Projects Included:
- Full Home Renovation

- Millwork and Carpentry
- Waterproofing and Tiling

- Electrical Work (Performed by licensed Electrician)
